text: ranilge 'ri gening shri lanka' wada piliwelath nishchitha salasmak.

harishchandra kopith narakama natha.

sanniwedana madhyaye swadhina adhikari balaya pilibanda sodisiyen sitima pinisa suwisheshi balathalawalin pohosath “oostreliyan fres kawunsil” saha “da angwatayisin standarng kawunsil” wani swadhina komisan wisin awidhimath warthakaranaya pilibanda dadi thindu thirana ganimata kisidu biyak ho malikamak nodakwana athara “rajakiya balapam” walata hasu nowana shakthimath wyuhayak thula sansthagatha kerunu swadhina parama balayak himi aayathanayo wethi.
wiweka athi welawal wala mama ema adawiyata gos, niwaradi kirimwala yedenawa.
me prathiwiplawayata aadhara kala aawaduwan athara champaka ha wel widane dedenek pamanak wethi.
menna rawela mata durakathana amathumak.
kese wethath, wyawastha wenasak sandaha parlimenthuwe thunen dekaka chandayak awashyawe.
me tharuna hadaya pardiyu kridakayanta dinana hati kiya dun apuru upadeshakayaku bawata pathwi sitiye wasarakata pera sitaya.

in pasu eya thamage adhyathmaya bawata pathwenawa.

eeta amatharawa 19 wana aandukrama wyawasthawa saha swadhina komishan sabha pathkirima pilibandawa da wipaksha nayakawaraya saha indiya widesha lekamwaraya athara sakachcha pawathi bawa ema prakashakaya sandahan kaleya.

kalantharayak thisse moramin pawathi aarthika deshapalana aakruthiyak thawa duratath mora yamata idakadak nowime kutaprapthiya wuye rajyaya muladharmawadiwima bawa pahadili karunaki. 1978 di hadunwa dun nawa libaral aarthika deshapalana ramuwa shri lanka deshapalanaye me aanthika dhrawikaranayata wadi dayakathwayak dara atha.

niyapothu athulata indikatu walin widima , niyapothu galawima , mahapota angiliwalin paya ganan ella thabima , poluwalin pahara dima bhumithel walin pengawu aawarana hisa saha muhuna wasa husma hira kirima , daraganimata nohaki iriyawwalin sirakaruwan thabima , jalaya yodagena wadha hinsa paminawima, lingendriyanta hani kirima aadi krura wadha hinsa, thrasthawadaya walakwime panatha yatathe ath adanguwata ganu labu ayata pamunuwa thibena bawa thahawuru wu bawa ben emarsan mahatha kiya sitiyeya.
